name: age-hidden-init-rolls
description: Roll d20 initiative + set bonus for many characters comma split and set HP,AC,PD,MD

options.name: names
options.description: All Character's name split by comma

options.name: initiatives
options.description: All Character's initiatives bonus split by comma

options.name: hps
options.description: All Character's health points split by comma

options.name: acs
options.description: All Character's armor classes split by comma

options.name: pds
options.description: All Character's physical defenses split by comma

options.name: mds
options.description: All Character's mental defenses split by comma
